SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDM_DEVICE WHERE 1=1
AND MODEL_NAME LIKE #modelName# || %
AND OUI LIKE #oui# || '%'
AND SN LIKE #sn# || '%'

SELECT A.DEVICE_ID ,A.PARENT_ID ,A.DEVICE_TYPE ,A.MODEL_NAME ,A.OUI ,A.MANUFACTURER ,A.EMBEDED_URI ,A.SN ,A.AUTH_ID ,A.AUTH_PWD ,A.BS_STATUS ,DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_UPDATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM HDM_DEVICE A WHERE 1=1
AND MODEL_NAME LIKE #modelName# || %
AND OUI LIKE #oui# || '%'
AND SN LIKE #sn# || '%'
ORDER BY A.#sn#
ORDER BY A.DEVICE_ID

SELECT A.DEVICE_ID ,A.PARENT_ID ,A.DEVICE_TYPE ,A.MODEL_NAME ,A.OUI ,A.MANUFACTURER ,A.EMBEDED_URI ,A.SN ,A.AUTH_ID ,A.AUTH_PWD ,A.BS_STATUS ,DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_UPDATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM HDM_DEVICE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEVICE_ID = #deviceId#

SELECT A.ID , A.DEVICE_ID , A.MODEL_NAME , A.SN , A.RESOURCE_URI , A.RESOURCE_NAME , A.ERROR_DATA , DATE_FORMAT(A.ERROR_TIME, '%Y %c/%e %T') AS ERROR_TIME , A.ERROR_CODE , A.ERROR_GRADE , A.ERROR_NAME , A.CREATE_YN , A.CREATE_TIME , IFNULL((SELECT T.MANUFACTURER FROM hdm.HDM_DEVICE T WHERE T.DEVICE_ID = A.DEVICE_ID), '') AS MANUFACTURER FROM HDH_ERROR_HIST A WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY A.ERROR_TIME DESC, A.ERROR_GRADE DESC LIMIT 30

SELECT A.ID , A.DEVICE_ID , A.MODEL_NAME , A.SN , A.RESOURCE_URI , A.RESOURCE_NAME , A.CTL_TYPE , A.CTL_DATA , A.CTL_RESULT , A.ERROR_CODE , DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_TIME, '%Y %c/%e %T') AS CREATE_TIME FROM HDH_CONTROL_HIST A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEVICE_ID = #deviceId# ORDER BY A.CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT 30

SELECT A.ID , A.DEVICE_ID , A.MODEL_NAME , A.SN , A.RESOURCE_URI , A.RESOURCE_NAME , A.ERROR_DATA , DATE_FORMAT(A.ERROR_TIME, '%Y %c/%e %T') AS ERROR_TIME , A.ERROR_CODE , A.ERROR_GRADE , A.ERROR_NAME , A.CREATE_YN , A.CREATE_TIME , IFNULL((SELECT T.MANUFACTURER FROM hdm.HDM_DEVICE T WHERE T.DEVICE_ID = A.DEVICE_ID), '') AS MANUFACTURER FROM HDH_ERROR_HIST A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEVICE_ID = #deviceId# ORDER BY A.ERROR_TIME DESC, A.ERROR_GRADE DESC LIMIT 30

SELECT 1 FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO hdh_status_hist (device_id, model_name, sn, resource_uri, resource_name, data, trigger_type, create_time, data_time, base_resource_uri) VALUES (#device_id#, #model_name#, #sn#, #resource_uri#, #resource_name#, #data#, #trigger_type#, now(), #data_time#, #resource_uri#)
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
